channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole at edge of speed bump, 15th March
item.description:
Deep - danger to vehicles and cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 118 Station Road, Woodmancote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on motorway slip road, 15th March
item.description:
Unbelievable levels of litter
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of rubbish/fridge freezer, 15th March
item.description:
Walking along Brockhampton Lane this morning 15/3, there are lots of black rubbish bags in the stream and other rubbish left adjacent. When walking back along the lane after lunch a fridge freezer has now been dumped along with spilt foods
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Tressellion Brockhampton Lane, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular flytipper, 15th March
item.description:
Someone is routinely dumping items by this lamp post, mostly things that could go to charity shops.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 593 Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on Brooklyn Road outside the community centre, 15th March
item.description:
The pothole opposite number 11 Brooklyn Road itâ€™s about 8 cm deep. Can somebody fill it in please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Put all about 10 cm deep on Brooklyn Road at the approach to Tennyson Road roundabou, 15th March
item.description:
Can somebody come and fill it in please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incredibly large/deep pothole, 15th March
item.description:
Very large & deep pothole to left side of road if going up incline. Right next to school. Needs fixing asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 58b Church Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes next to a school, 15th March
item.description:
Numerous potholes right next to a school. Hard to avoid.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 East End Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Tyres, 15th March
item.description:
Dumped tyres by the stream.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Bothy Rushley Lane, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road falling apart, 14th March
item.description:
The road is in a really poor state here, so much so that cycling down it was painful and I nearly bounced into a car while trying to navigate it. Please can this be fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 127 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road falling apart, 14th March
item.description:
This road is in an awful state. Driving down it is bad enough - cycling is painful.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 45 Reddings Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes on both sides of road, 14th March
item.description:
4 or 5 deep potholes on both sides of road in the same spot, now impossible for motorists to miss right outside of entrance to primary school, drivers swerving at last minute to avoid them is dangerous to pedestrians and cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Church Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cleeve Common Road, 14th March
item.description:
A pothole has opened up across the road such that it cannot be avoided. The location is just past the turning to Drypool Farm. All along the road - potholes have opened up again and have gotten quite deep in places. Please can these be filled in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 'Split' in road where concrete plates meet, 14th March
item.description:
This damage to the road surface on Gilpin Rd (between Gatton Way & Duncroft Rd junctions) has worsened significantly during the winter months as water gathers in the split and then freezes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 98 Gilpin Avenue, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti in 3 places,in Manor Rd near Swindon Hall and by stile near village hall. Also on Road sign for Manor Court, 14th March
item.description:
These appeared several weeks ago, appear to have made with aerosol paint spray. You may recognize the graffiti "signature" from other locations ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 45 Church Road, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Coach parking on pavement and double yellow lines, 14th March
item.description:
Race going coach parked illegally

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 38a Church Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wood on bridge rotten, 14th March
item.description:
On footpath CHP10, between Mill Street and Shaw Green Lane, the first couple of boards on the wooden bridge have rotted and there is a hole, gate end.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Mill Close Mill Street, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van parked on Double Yellow Line, 14th March
item.description:
Van parked obstructing traffic. Major tailbacks of race traffic which will no doubt continue for the whole week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Garages Hailes Street, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole Charlton Abbotts village, 14th March
item.description:
Big pot hole

item.title: Beer cans...., 14th March
item.description:
More beer cans, looks like the idiots dropping piles of them like the green areas even if there are bins within spitting distance!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 38 Bedford Avenue, Cheltenham
